entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
